entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
